know us

Â¿About us?

We are a Colombian company dedicated to international trade, logistics, marketing, import, export of products, and project cargo, in the agricultural, industrial, service, and automotive sectors, established in 2016. We have a qualified human resource with over 20 years of experience, dedicated to meeting the consumption needs of our clients in various areas and special projects in different cities around the world.

Mission

Facilitating logistical solutions based on operational excellence, generating added value within the supply chain for our entire team, clients, and strategic allies.

Vision

To be recognized as leaders in customs solutions, distinguished by our excellence in customer service, technological innovation, and commitment to integrity in every transaction. We strive to simplify customs processes and contribute to the success of our clients in international trade.

Some facts

Number one place to manage all your shipments.

At SLOC, we not only focus on connecting the world through transportation but also strive to be an innovative and industry-leading company. Here are some interesting facts you might not know about us:

Values

We have been a trusted logistics company for 6 years.

Integrity

We act with honesty and transparency in all our operations, complying with regulations and ethics.

Execellence

We strive to provide exceptional service, offering solutions tailored to the needs of each client.

Innovation

We constantly seek new technologies and processes to improve the efficiency and quality of our services, keeping us at the forefront of the industry.

Collaboration

We work as a team, both within our company and with our clients and business partners, to achieve optimal results and overcome challenges together.

Quality

We pursue excellence in all we do, ensuring accuracy, timeliness, and reliability in every customs process we handle.

Orientation

We put the needs and interests of our clients at the center of our operations, being receptive to their feedback and suggestions.
